name: Styx: Master of Shadows
summary: Styx: Master of Shadows is a stealth video game developed by Cyanide Studios for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. The game is a prequel, and the second video game to take place in the world established by 2012's Of Orcs and Men.
info:
• 中文名: 冥河：暗影大师
  • 开发: Cyanide
  • 发行: Focus Home Interactive
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PlayStation 4
  • 平台: Microsoft Windows
  • 游戏类型: 潜行
  • 游戏引擎: 虚幻3
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 发行日期: 2014年10月7号
